Featured Draft Members this week!

  • Photo:Courtesy of Twitter.com

Nick Bolton

Age: 21
Position: Linebacker
College: University of Missouri
Height: 6-0
Weight: 237 lbs.

One FACT to know: Nick Bolton was starting linebacker 22 times in the past 2 years at University of Missouri, all the while earning First Team ALL-SEC Honors in those years and earning Second Team All-American Team recognition in 2020.


  • Photo:Courtesy of Arrowhead Addict.com

Creed Humphrey

Age: 22
Position: Offensive Line-Center
College: University of Oklahoma
Height: 6-5
Weight: 320 lbs.

One FACT to know: Creed can bench 475 lbs. and can squat more than 700 lbs. per Dane Brugler of the Athletic.
